metadata.synopsis: Garron Flintsplitter, Refugee_08, rambles about his journey with his wife, sister and mother.

0.speaker: Garron Flintsplitter
0.text: Actually got here safely, towing along my wife, sister, and mother! Or maybe they towed me along, eh?

1.speaker: Garron Flintsplitter
1.text: We made it this far, me and my ladies. I wish I could see a way forward from here. 'Can't dig a mine if you don't know where to stick your pick.'
